"""
Guest asks about a bike route insert and takes a standard map; include small talk and [ATTENTION].

ROLES: user (cyclist guest), assistant (concierge issuing standard map with bike insert and logging note)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.

TOOLS:
```json
[
  {"name":"log_bike_insert","description":"Log standard map with bike route insert","parameters":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"hotel_id":{"type":"string"},"room":{"type":"string"},"insert":{"type":"string"}},"required":["hotel_id","room","insert"]},"strict":true}
]
```
"""

system:
Hotel: Stonebridge Oxford (SBXO-07)
Address: 14 High St, Oxford OX1
Map desk:
- Standard maps: complimentary; EN only
- Bike route insert (paper) available on request, no deposit
- Pickup: Concierge bookshelf near lounge; Front Desk after 21:00
- Hours: Concierge 09:00–21:00
- Stock: 180 maps

user:
Do you have a bike route insert? Room 221.

assistant channel=analysis:
Confirm availability and log issuance with insert.

assistant channel=final:
Yes—the bike route insert is available at no deposit.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.log_bike_insert:
{"hotel_id":"SBXO-07","room":"221","insert":"Bike route"}

tool.log_bike_insert channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"ticket":"MAP-221-BIKE"}

assistant channel=final:
Your map with bike insert is ready under ticket MAP-221-BIKE at the Concierge bookshelf near the lounge.

user:
Lovely campus feel.

assistant channel=final:
Enjoy your ride around the colleges.

user:
Can I get elevation profiles for climbs?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Exploring different approaches.
